Name: Trash Time
About the game: Trash Time is a virtual reality game that can teach you how to recycle in a fun way. Burnt trash accumulates CO2 gas, that is one of the leading causes of global warming. Try to save the Earth by playing as a alien robot with flexible hands, recycle trash using powerups and power tools. Make sure that you recycle to the max, the Earth is in stake ! Available power-ups * Magnet (collects metalic trash automaticaly) * Compactor (compacts the trash and ensures maximum cash per item) * Flexible hands (reach the trash without much work) This project was supported using public funding by Slovak Arts Council
Meta Title: Trash Time: Mar 8, 2019, Dalibor Bartoš and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Trash Time? Check out the release date (Mar 8, 2019), developer insights from Dalibor Bartoš, and a complete game summary.
